summary: Implements the Earley parsing algorithm for the Lark library, handling token scanning, syntactic analysis, error detection, and construction of a shared packed parse forest (SPPF) that can be transformed into concrete parse trees and used for predictive auto‑completion.
business_intent: Provide a robust, general‑purpose parser capable of handling ambiguous grammars and delivering parse results, error information, and completion suggestions for applications that need to interpret or validate structured text.
